title: A parallel of the spirit of the people, with the spirit of Mr. Rogers. And an appeal thereupon unto the reader, whether the spirit of the people, or the spirit of men like Mr. Rogers, be the sitter to be trusted with the government. By James Harrington.
author: Harrington, James, 1611-1677.
publisher: Printed by J.C. for Henry Fletcher, at the signe of the three Gilt Cups in St. Pauls Church-yard.,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
